comment: She helps you in every way she can, even for other classes. You must pay attention to her lectures. Test are tough if you don't study. She splits the assignments through the  semester so they are not due all at once. Class is a relaxed environment, its easy to participate in discussions. I would take her anytime.
Great Teacher! Created a great learning environment for learning and really was concerned with the success and well-being of her students. I highly recommend her for any course she teaches.
Amazing. Multiple choice Mid /final exam , group project. Dr. Roach is an Amazing Professor . TAKE HER you wouldn't regret
